dictionary.description: It's speculated that when the gods started their attack, King Radmuhl of Elysian was torn between putting up a fight or abandoning his kingdom. As the La Veda Republic fell to the power of the gods, unwilling to leave his throne, the king ordered his finest knight to take his daughter to safety, which Xenon dutifully did. However, neither of them expected that destiny had something else in store...
dictionary.evolution:
In times of peril,
the strength of one's soul
can do much more than his sword.
dictionary.fusion:
I have failed...
But I can't let that get me down!
As long as I exist, I'll grow stronger.
dictionary.summon:
I'll fight alongside you
if you promise to protect
Princess Estia, too.
